description:
This has to be my favorite movie. Ever.
I had a boner from the beginning, all through our filming, and all the way to the end. It was like the room was on fire. It was literally that hot.
Of course, it didn't hurt that we were filming two of my all-time favorite models, Billy and Parker.
Billy has been letting his body hair grow out and I swear he gets sexier every time I see him.
And Parker. Well, I just love everything about him. His personality, his muscles, his smile, his furry butt, his big cock, and his low-hanging nuts. Everything.
We were back at my friend's lakeside condo in the mountains.
"What do you think of him?" I asked Billy as I was pointing at Parker.
Billy looked at Parker in a shy kind of way. Parker had a big grin on his face.
"He's really sexy," Billy replied.
Parker laughed. They'd already had some time to hang out and bond.
"I can't wait for him to fuck me."
And man, did they ever fuck!
Now, I know that Parker is straight and all, but I really think that he and Billy were into each other on this one. It was fucking fantastic...
title: Billy & Parker
